## Description {#details}

This is the base class for a remark serializer.

It includes support for using a string table while emitting.

Definition at line 42 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remarkserializer-h">RemarkSerializer.h</a>.

### StrTab {#aa72574e7bd50aa35940e878f31635e1a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::optional&lt;StringTable&gt; llvm::remarks::RemarkSerializer::StrTab</>}>
The string table containing all the unique strings used in the output.

The table can be serialized to be consumed after the compilation.
